reviewText: Other than showing how new technology and crowd sourcing were being used to contribute to finding what may or may not be the sight of Genghis Khan's tomb, this documentary falls flat.  Its little more than a documentary about a few people trying not to get their trucks stuck in mud. Very little is given in terms of the history of Genghis Khan.  Its overall pretty boring, plus all findings (which are minimal) are inconclusive because the Mongolian government has forbidden any digging in the area.
